content: add a touch of flair to your outfit with this colorful crescent shaped shawl worked in fingering weight yarn the main body of this shawl is worked from end to end with increases and decreases to make the crescent shape the lacy border is worked back and forth along the curved edge once the main body is complete easily adjustable in length and depth errata row 16 of edging should end with a double_crochet not a single_crochet as written in pattern **size** finished size 27 deep x 80 wingspan 68 5 cm deep x 203 cm wingspan **gauge** 16 dcs and 8 row = 4 10 cm after wet blocking **hook** size us 7 4 5mm hook **yarn** sample worked with hazel knits artisan 90% merino 10% nylon 400 yards 366 meters /120 grams atmosphere mc 2 skeins miss babs yummy 2ply 100% merino 400 yards 366 meters /115 grams perilous voyage cc 1 skein **notions** tapestry needle
